## ExtrudedPolygonTechniqueParams.defaultColor property

Default color used if feature doesn't provide color attribute and \[\[MapEnv\]\] did not return it too.  color-hex

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
defaultColor?: DynamicProperty<StyleColor>;
```
